thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 13 of 337
thread.title: Miranda

author: Miranda
title: Miranda
text: Although communication is good, they stated that my book was a teachers guide when in fact it was not. It had the capabilities of having "teachers review" in an online program. The ISBN matched perfectly and that is not the case in the teachers edition of the book. I think they used a lame excuse to not have to pay me. It was o lay $7. And some change but I'm sure they sold it for more than that since it was the actual text book. Beware if you sell your books with this company.
